item.title: Kubernetes学习笔记(一) 网络基础part1
item.description: Kubernetes is All about Networking. 因此，先从网络开始学习。 基础知识视频： https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6v_BDHIgOY8 基础知识视频的代码地址：https://github.com/kristenjacobs/container-networking 1 k8s网络要求 All containers can communicate with all other containers without NAT. All nodes can communicate with all containers(and vice-verse) without NAT. The IP that a container sees itself as is the same IP that others see it as. 2 网络 2.1 Single network namespace. 整体示意图：根据本地网络环境，设置IP env.sh CON="con" NODE_IP="10.0.2.15" IP="172.16.0.1" 下面对setup.sh每条命令，进行解释 2.1.1 设置CON/NODE_IP/IP环境变量 #!/bin/bash -e .
